website_summaries.verdict: Works to relieve chronic pain and anxiety. CO2-extracted and lab-tested.
pros: Helps relieve pain, inflammation, and stress
Its proprietary blend is organically grown in Colorado
cons: Not all users felt its positive effects

customer_reviews.title: Best CBD oil for sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CBD oil to help me sleep, and have been very impressed. The first night, I noticed a more restful/deeper sleep. As I have continued to use this product, I’ve noticed that I fall asleep earlier, and stay asleep through the night. I have struggled with insomnia off and on, and had been in one of those bouts until I started taking this. I would highly recommend this CBD oil for sleep. The dropper comes with measurements marked on it, so you can adjust your dose to what works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: This Hemp oil has been amazingly effective for me for a number of problems (hip pain from a hip replacement, lower back pain, peripheral neuropathy, stress, anxiety, and sleep problems). It has either 'cured' or dramatically improved all those things.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered R & R Hemp Oil 1000mg on October 6 and received it on October 9. Ordering the product was easy and delivery was quick plus I received follow-up email from R & R about the status of my order. I bought this oil for pain relief and healthy sleep pattern. This product has exceeded my expectations because I'm getting amazing relief from arthritis pain, neuropathy and sleep problems plus it is helping with stress relief. I would definitely recommend R & R Hemp Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Narum

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is snake oil. Advertised as CBD oil, contains no CBD. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely misleading, if you are looking for CBD oil DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Johnson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Don't use if being drug tested!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT use this product if there's a chance you'll need a drug test. I used less than a dropper each night for about 3 weeks and had to take a urine drug screen for employment. I failed and consequently lost the job.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Contains no CBD
customer_reviews.text: nicely packaged and not unpleasant to consume, but please do not confuse this product with CBD. I am a quadriplegic searching for something to replace the opioids the VA is giving me. I purchased and consumed this thinking it was CBD. What I'm learning is CBD is MUCH more expensive. Whatever your quest, good luck. I'd return it, but I used it all hoping for some result that hasn't manifested.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Valentine

customer_reviews.title: WoW!!!! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: I could actually feel this hit my system. I am on day 3 now and this has allowed me to think more clearly without the anxiety making my mind spin 1000 times a second. So glad I found you!!! Thanks R & R
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Never do negative reviews but here is my first
customer_reviews.text: I have watched my wife suffer from many of the things this product promises to help. In her case, it simply does not work. I don't know how effective it is but until these products are regulated and tested properly, I will not be buying them again. Huge disappointment that wasn't a cheap product. I will be returning this immediately. Sorry I could not recommend this but the product does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: They maybe some side effects.
customer_reviews.text: One week after consuming it, I started with tinnitus and vertigo. Also my heart pulsation we’re very strong that I could feel it everywhere in my body. And I’m a very fit person with no cardiovascular condition or any other conditions. But it helped me to sleep and feel more relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Gamaliel Negrón

customer_reviews.title: This is not CBD
customer_reviews.text: Its over priced hemp oil, not CBD. It does zero for pain, don't waste your time and more importantly your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nap

customer_reviews.title: ineffective and disturbing at suggested dosage
customer_reviews.text: 30 drops at bedtime is recommended, however it caused bad dreams and feelings of disquiet
customer_reviews.author: gerry p. harkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great flavor and wonderful results.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the R+R Medicinals 300mg CBD oil for a couple months and like the effect but felt the need to use a couple doses for my back pain. I was glad to see this 1000mg CBD oil which basically matched what I was taking. Love the product as it works great to help me relax. Love supporting a local Colorado business.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hemp oil. I have tried another more expensive brand in the past and did not have the same results. This hemp oil really helps me be a little calmer and not have as much anxiety. It also has helped me sleep better. It does taste like the plant which I love! I also love that it is organic, one of the reasons I went with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Hemp not CBD
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I believe this isn’t CBD oil, it’s hemp oil which is not the real stuff. Do your research before you buy. Hemp oil is not CBD oil.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C Tarr

customer_reviews.title: No Effects!
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing. I ordered two for myself, and one for my mom with cancer. Stay away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Helps!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has relieved my migranes and back aches and i can tell its working to help my antiexy i take a small dose early in my day and one around bed time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several variations of hemp and CBD oils. R+R Hemp Extract seems to work much better in controlling my joint pain as compared to other brands that I've tried. I highly recommend that you try it so you can see for yourself! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Reduced pain.
customer_reviews.text: I use the oil for my dog and myself for pain. My dog has a neurological problem. The oil helps him walk. As well as hair, nails, helping with sleep and all around feeling better. I highly recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Got sick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sick since taking this for a week. It worked great at the start but I’ve been fighting stomach issues ever since. Drs. saying this was the cause.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my grandfather Hes been living with rheumatoid arthritis for over 15 years no pain medicine would help his pain! I purchased the hemp oil on a hope that it would help him cope with the pain! Hes been taking it about two weeks now! Hes never felt so great in years no prescription drug could make the pain go away but this hemp oil did!
customer_reviews.author: MGrimm

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for essential tremors.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Bought a product locally called Nu-Leaf that worked immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best 40 bucks ever spent. Took half of dose (half ml) in the am i felt great ALL day. I even enjoyed being at work. Recommend it to ANYONE. Amazing stuff. Dont think twice. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for, great results, taste, and strength
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this so read all the discriptions of the CBD Hemp Oil products and felt that R n R sounded the best. I am not disappointed. This has really helped me and improved my life in two ways. First, It has relieved the Bursitis pain in my leg so I can take my daily walk smiling instead of limping. Secondly, it has somehow given me the confidence I was lacking in interacting with other people. I feel much more relaxed when confronted with others in daily tasks. It has no bad tastes and the mg strength is a nice amount. I have recommended this R n R to friends.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: How well this product works.
customer_reviews.text: I started With thousand mg a week ago. I have chronic pain which includes arthritis,fibromyalgia,depression and other issues. I was using another brand but the price was outrageous. It took about 3 days to start feeling the effect, which is working very well. I am not feeling the Pain from the inflammation and my Depression and mood are doing better. I do plan on ordering more from this company. I believe I will be very happy with this product and company. I want to thank you
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: So THAT'S why it's so expensive!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to treat anxiety per the advice of an actual physician (yeah, I know...). I took 3 droppers full (max dose) about 30 minutes before a particularly stressful work meeting. In about 10 minutes I was catatonic. I couldn't speak for fear that whatever I said was going to sound like the ramblings of an intoxicated idiot. I've never done well with THC. I know this stuff supposedly has all the THC removed, but I swear this was NOT in any way a placebo effect. I was flat out stoned. Stoned like I ate a special cookie in college, stoned. So, if you're a smoker (toker), it's definitely worth its weight.
customer_reviews.author: The Moon Ring - "It Farts When you Open it!"

customer_reviews.title: Value for Quantity
customer_reviews.text: Considering the size of the bottle and the potency of each dose, compared to a competing product I had previously purchased, this is definitely worth the purchase. I have been able to reach desired effects in far smaller, and fewer dosages than the other product! Additionally, the competing product I had previously tried was grainy and had a very earthy taste. This product is clean, and has just enough peppermint flavor to overcome any earthy taste without being overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A+ CBD Oil.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best! I have tried others but haven’t received as good of results as when I use R+R products.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bertholdi

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different hemp oil products and this one has the best flavor. It is as advertised and true hemp oil because after about 10 minutes I can feel the pain fade away and enjoy a nice calm relaxing feeling away from pain. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: OK already! I am no longer a doubter
customer_reviews.text: Used for back pain and sciatica, in conjunction with Aleve. Definitely a big improvement! Also sleep better. This may sound strange, but the soles of my feet feel like I am walking on pillows... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Has not been effective for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a week for anxiety and pain management, but I have not felt any difference. I have increased the dosage to the point I have used over half the bottle in a little over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes nasty
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy again. Tasted like dirty bong water
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Pain is almost gone after just 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using R&R hemp oil for almost 2 weeks & I am firm believer in this product. It definitely needed to build up for the first few days before I noticed any effects but I have not used or needed to take any OTC medicine like ibuprofen or naproxsyn in the last 10 days. Not only has it decreased my pain to almost nothing, but I am sleeping better, having better digestion and losing some weight. I have been recommending this product to everyone I know that has chronic pain. I am so glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tluvin

customer_reviews.title: BACK PAIN/S.I. JOINT PAIN
customer_reviews.text: I USED THIS FOR THE INFLAMMATION IN MY SACRO ILIAC JOINT AND BACK....HAVE HAD DEBILITATING PAIN FOR OVER 7 YEARS...THIS SEEMS TO CUT THE PAIN LEVEL THAT SOMETIMES IS AT AN 8 OUT OF 10, AND TAKES IT DOWN TO 3-5 ISH DEPENDING ON THE TIME/DAY. I'M VERY FRUGAL, AND MY HUSBAND JUST BOUGHT ME A 3 PACK (AND THE 15% OFF COUPON TOOK OFF OVER $16! YAY!) OF THIS. I WOULDN'T SPEND THIS KIND OF MONEY ON IT IF I DIDN'T FEEL LIKE IT WORKED. IT'S WORTH TRYING. I'M CONVINCED.
customer_reviews.author: Guy B Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking the oil due to anxiety and limit my ADHD, and I am happy to say that it does help with remaining calm and feeling more relaxed. I will continue to use this product, the only downfall would be the price. I wish it was a little cheaper, but after reviewing other products from different companies...it seems like you get what you pay for. I would recommend this product to others. Keep in mind it does not give you a "high" feeling, it just helps with a calming effect.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, really relaxed me... except it contains peppermint oil, which then induced nausea and stomach acid, so it’s not good for someone with stomach acid problems unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: mmj

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I have Fibromyalgia and anxiety. My Fibro pain has decreased significantly and my anxiety has been decreased also. I have tried about 6 different CBC oils and this one works the best and is about half the price of most others I've tried. I will buy this product exclusively from now on
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Fauver

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: When I tried it in the 1st 2 weeks I was not taking enough to feel the effects that I was reading about in reviews. Being skeptical I figured I'd ask the R+R Co. if I was taking the correct dosage. I emailed the cust service and was surprised to get a return email the same day! I increased the dosage and within 20 minutes felt the oil work! I felt calm, more focused and the joint pain I endure was definitely better! I hope the long term effects occur as well...like sleep. I highly recommend this product and as a matter of fact ordered my 2nd bottle last Saturday and received it today...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lint

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stiff neck and sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought for anxiety and sleep, helpful. Just reordered. I was not a believer but migraines will have you desperate. I wish i got this a long time ago. I did my research as it can be overwhelming. 1000 mg is perfect for me. Will not switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope19

customer_reviews.title: Not good in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Taste is horrid.... went in for standard yearly bloodwork. Liver enzymes were off the chart, ( had never happened before) I stopped taking this product. dr reran liver tests and things are going back to normal, wish I knew who to send this product to get it tested to see just what’s in it. Scared me! Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: leah aaron

customer_reviews.title: Patience for results
customer_reviews.text: Used for pain management, it takes an entire bottle to figure out the correct dosage and frequentcy. After that at twice a day, doube the recommended dosage, I stared seeing an improvement. A larger bottle for the price would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered R & R Hemp Oil 1000mg. The delivery was quick plus I received an email from R & R to let me know that my purchase was on its way to me. I bought this oil for pain relief and to improve my sleep. This product has exceeded my expectations because I'm getting significant relief from arthritis pain, nephropathy and sleep problems. I have suffered from nephropathy pain for years and this is the first product I have used that has provided me with any sort of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my horse.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use this for my barrel racing horse. She is 14 years old and has had a history of injurys and rough riding, because of this she gets anxiety. After giving her a booster dose then tapering to a maintaince dose ( recommended by research) her over all composition has drastically changed from night to day. Less sore, more relaxed, focused, and able to calm her more easily than before, and over all she is comfortable. This is in just 3 days time.
customer_reviews.author: Bastrop_Txfarrier

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. My sister who has pain from two back surgeries, has spinal stenosis, three bulging discs, and a host of other problems, used this product after her doctor lowered her morphine due to new state regulations. She said it was the first time in a long while her pain was almost gone, and she slept like a baby. She uses 600 on "not too bad days, pain a 7 out if 10" and 1000 on really painful days pain level 10 out of 10. This product is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Don't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work it taste like the good all of oil in them or something
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had sciatic nerve pain,arthritis in my lower back ,shoulder pain from my job for years.Im fifty years old.Alot of the normal aches and pains from just getting old.This CBD OIL is the only thing that keeps the aches and pain away as long as I keep taking one or two doses a day.I can tell if I don't take it.I have tried other brands and get the better relief from this brand, R and R Medicinal.I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hemp CBD oil!!
customer_reviews.text: As a health care practitioner in an Emergency Department, I often suffer from back pain and have trouble falling asleep after a crazy day. I’ve been using various CBD oils for the past 6 months and have been using this one exclusively for the past 3 months. It definitely has reduced my pain and constant use of NSAIDs, while helping me fall asleep easier. It has also greatly reduced my anxiety and stress with every day life. I’ve highly recommended this product to my colleagues! I selected this product based on reviews and I’m definitely very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I took a chance on this brand. I've been using the 1000 mg hemp oil for one week. Relaxes my anxious mind, helps me fall into a deeper sleep, and eliminated my insane menstrual cramps this week. Following the recommended dosage, I experienced minimal cramps on day 1 of my period. No more cramps all week. That was unexpected as I made this purchase to help with anxiety and insomnia, not my insane period. I am very thankful. The one improvement I would like to see is a dropper with the measurement markings.
customer_reviews.author: DeA

customer_reviews.title: Trusted source and veteran owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from R&R. I researched everything about hemp and R&R was everything I was looking for. Organic, co2 extracted, verified by a 3rd party etc... It definitely helps me sleep and helps to keep my blood pressure down so I can workout without being sleep deprived.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It has helped the most with my lower back pain and my wife has noticed I'm more enjoyable to be around 😂 I have also been waking up feeling more rested taking 1ml before bed. I will recommend this product to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEMP OIL I FOUND ON THE MARKET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a couple local Hemp Oils with no luck, I searched amazon, and Oil got the best reviews. It met and exceeded all expectations. I was in a MVA 6 years ago, being hit in the drivers side door. I was told I may never walk again. I was in and out of hospitals trying to help me get better. This Hemp Oil, actually helps me get sleep, and no pain while I sleep. The most comfortable sleep since prior to my MVA. This Hemp Oil, also helps with my mood, since the MVA I suffer from depression. I only have positive comments about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Duane

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This oil is garbage. I don't know why there are so many good reviews on it, they are probably bought. 1000mg per serving? No, I don't think so. The serving size that is on the bottle says "40 drops"... which is a quarter of the bottle. Yet the bottle states that there are 30 servings in it. There is no way. And even if you take a quarter of the bottle (which I did yesterday), it still does absolutely nothing. I almost wonder if they are packaging cooking oil and adding some hemp flavoring to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and is affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different Hemp oils, some expensive and some cheap and none of them did much to help my pains. This is by far the best I've tried and for a fraction of the price. I could feel the difference in my pain in just a matter of a couple of days. My husband has been on a hemp oil I purchased from our local pharmacy and although it does a great job, it's twice the cost as R & R Hemp oil. I can't wait to start my husband on R & R because he has a lot of back and neck pain. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger R.

customer_reviews.title: Helped with anxiety and neck pain!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with this CBD oil, and yes it is CBD oil, not hemp seed oil as some reviews have said. It has made a HUGE difference in my anxiety and neck pain. I couldn't believe how much it helped. This is definitely something I will be using long-term. Very high quality product with a great peppermint taste.
customer_reviews.author: Arora

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This product really does nothing for me. Didn’t help with inflammation, arthritis, or pain. I bought four bottles for myself and family members. Not impressed at all. Should have done more homework on different products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and have found the CBD to be the most effective supplement I have taken to reduce inflammation and stiffness. I was recently out of the country and did not take it with me. Within days I noticed a substantial difference. When I returned home and resumed usage, I felt the positive effects in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: R&R Medicinals Takes Its Product Seriously. So Should You.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by the detail in the lab tests shared by R&R Medicinals. The fact that they open up their facilities to FDA inspection and have lab results at the batch level suggests that they take their product and manufacturing facility very seriously. That is my first observation. The second is that the product, when used consistently, lives up to R&R Medicinals claims...it helps with sleep, stress and for me, exercise-induced inflammation. It is priced less than other competitors out there who charge up to 30-40% more for the same dosage and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Sartorelli

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Oil Drops
customer_reviews.text: There has been a lot of anxiety and stress in my life recently, so after trying certain oils, diffusers, and scents sprays. I decided to try this after a family member introduced me to some mouth spray that tasted like this. It helped with my stress and anxiety for a while, eventually I had to back off because it stopped helping. Hopefully the stuff doesn’t go bad or expire. I have no complaints, it isn’t insanely pricey, it did it’s job or helped me enough. Might buy again. Amazing product and the company that sold me this, they reach out and asked how my experience with this stuff is.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Lab Tested Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This Hemp Extract Medicinal is Worth it's weight in Gold... The Price is very Reasonable for the Quality and Strenght.. 1000mg per 30ml is a good price in and of itself, but the 3rd party Lab testing shows that the average bottle has More than the 1000mgs listed... The effects for Sleep are amazing... Very fast and a Good Night Sleep Follows... The only thing I am not fond of is the Flavor... I expected a Much more Peppermint punch but got a flavor I really am not fond of, but that's ok, given the Quality of this CBD, I'll Deal with it... At 72 years Old I am very Happy to find that this product works for me...
customer_reviews.author: Trishalla

customer_reviews.title: Helps get a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from insomnia for many years and over the counter sleep aids don't work. I refuse to take narcotics to help with them because I have seen what addiction can do. Melatonin increases my anxiety attacks and valerian root doesn't work. Essential oils relax me but doesn't necessarily help with sleep. I have tried other CBD oils and Hemp extracts and BY FAR this is the BEST brand out there. I go to sleep faster then ever, sleep deeper, and stay asleep longer. It is my miracle worker.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a pretty good product for me, as far as pain, stress relief, and overall calmness. I’ve been taking it twice a day, and although I don’t really notice any dramatic changes when I take it, I do notice that after about 30-40 minutes I just feel better all over. I have chronic pain, so this tincture takes the edginess away from my aches and stiffness associated with the pain I have. The taste is not so good, but not so bad after the first dose. It’s more a an earthy, hemp taste, with mint added. I don’t mind it at all😊
customer_reviews.author: Carla J

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing for me. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Anxiety away!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from extreme PTSD and anxiety and was tired of the side effects of prescribed medications so researched natural options. I came across your product and read about 200 reviews before I purchased. I'm so happy that I purchased this product. After 2nd dose of 2ml each I felt a wonderful calming effect wash over me without a groggy or cloudy feeling! I also love it's a veteran owned company! Thank you for taking the time to create an effective natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS NO CBD.
customer_reviews.text: This is Not cbd oil. In fact most of the items on here say hemp oil but does not contain cbd nor is it listed on the product. Very sneaky, would not purchase again even if it was free . Shame on most of these false reviews waisting my hard earned money wish I listened to the one review that stated it contains no cbd but with all of the positive reviews you can be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the oil work! A #1 oil of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Hemp oil I’ve tried. This will be the last because it’s so awesome. I recommend this to anyone taking Hemp oil. It’s an excellent product 💯
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: This Hemp Oil Put Me In The ER
customer_reviews.text: BE WARNED. After taking this hemp oil, I started having vertigo and heavy heartbeats/breathing that led to a panic attack that put me in the ER. The doctors couldn't figure out what was wrong, but for 3 days I suffered from an almost constant panic attack. It wasn't until I decided to take a stroll through the bad reviews of this product that I noticed other people had the same results with heavy heartbeats and vertigo. So be careful if you decide to take this oil and if you experience ANY form of heavy heartbeat, vertigo, or anxiety, be sure to STOP right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ryan Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help relieve back and knee discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried one other CBD oil but I like this one much better. I take a dropper full at bedtime and it seems to be helping me sleep well. I have also noticed my lower back and knee pain have diminished. I've used this product for a month and a half with good results.
customer_reviews.author: R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to try hemp oil for my arthritic pain,wasn't sure I could believe the claims. After just 3 days I can really feel the difference! So easy to take, the taste is pleasant, and not too strong. I purchased from R+R Medicinals because of their manufacturing process and customer reviews and I'm so happy with the product and speed of delivery. I will be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: FrannieP

customer_reviews.title: Great CBD Oil, very potent and fast absorbtion
customer_reviews.text: This is really great hemp oil, I use it every day to help with joint/muscle pain, and whenever I get migraines or headaches. This stuff absorbs faster than most hemp oil I have used. I feel relief after 15 minutes of use. The taste is really smooth and slightly minty, masking any unpleasant plant tastes completely. Highly recommended for everything from daily pain, to calming feelings of anxiety, restlessness, or irritability.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Natures miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer for me. I am a twice cancer survivor and after going through rigorous treatments have a heightened anxiety and difficulty sleeping. This is a product worked immediately after the first dose I noticed a difference and as I continued to use it it also helps with arthritis in my knees, gave me more energy and an overall feeling of well-being. I have never been one to like to use traditional medication so knowing that this product is from nature and full of phytonutrients without containing THC, made this the perfect product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mazcayman

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog with pain from IVDD
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund has IVDD and I do not like to use medications. This has helped me to ease his pain and anxiety so much. I can also use it for my headaches. Love this product!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best CBDs I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review but wanted to add a review, now that I’ve tried about 7 different brands of cbd. I’ve ordered this one twice, and didn’t expect it to be good, because of the price, but it is. I bought it for sleep and relaxation and it makes a positive difference. For those complaining that this is hemp and therefore has no real cbd, do your homework. This and Nuleaf are the two best cbd’s I’ve tried but this one is less than half the price of Nuleaf. If you think this doesn’t work, you’re taking the wrong dose or are expecting an experience that cbd does not deliver.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: This is HEMP oil NOT CBD!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this for a week and this “hemp oil” did nothing but the opposite effect that I wanted. It made my anxiety worse, stress levels were extremely high, stomach issues EVERYDAY (I thought I was sick), and didn’t notice any difference in my pain. Once I stopped taking this and switched to an actual CBD oil my symptoms have gone away. Read the ingredients before purchasing any CBD Oil related products, do research and don’t just base your decision on reviews like I did.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Do not take this hemp oil if you have to drive or your job required a drug test.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hemp oil I have ever used. I take 2ml every night before bed time, I feel no pain but just a little tingling in my body and I can sleep like a baby. Fast absorbing and I can feel the difference in my body instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Yuehuan Brownley

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hemp oil to help with sleep and alleviate knee and shoulder pain. I waited a few weeks to post review so as to give the product a good trial. I have experienced getting to sleep more quickly with less awakenings during the night, and have virtually eliminated a couple of meds that I took at times. The knee and shoulder pain is significantly reduced. The taste is not bad but not great, but what would one expect with a medicinal plant. Tastes way better than some essential oils do.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product above all others because of the people who make it.
customer_reviews.text: There are many products available. My suggestion is that if you need to just chill out, let you mind rest to prepare for sleep, do your research and choose what's best for you you. I chose this product because it provides me with the relaxation and clarity to focus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take this as it gets you stoned - confirmed THC
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently in the hospital as this product gets you apparently stoned and not in a good way. I can’t believe this. Yes I was tested positive for THC
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Granchi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fibromyalgia
customer_reviews.text: Both my mother and I have fibromyalgia and have a great deal of trouble sleeping at night. My mom actually took the hemp oil on her way to work for severe back pain and shes said by the time she had gotten to work it felt 70% better just in 30 minutes. I definitely recommend this to anybody who suffers from pain and insomnia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stress
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality CBD oil for the price. A small company with a great product. I researched a number of products and company's. I have tried several CBD tinctures from different company's, this is a wonderful product:)
customer_reviews.author: TNTGOATS

customer_reviews.title: I've started noticing a difference
customer_reviews.text: I've researched Hemp Oil and found many reasons to give this a try. I'm 80 yrs old and had noticed my memory was starting to fade which can be very embarrassing sometimes. I looked around Amazon and decided on R + R because of the high rating amongst many users. I started taking it several weeks ago and much to my surprise my memory is starting to show improvement. I've tried many other hopefuls and this is the first product that seems to be working. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: T Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for those who suffer from chronic pain.. I love that it is natural, and super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kris D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing difference!
customer_reviews.text: My sister gifted me with a bottle of R+R Medicinals Hemp Oil 1000mg. Let me tell you...I am SOLD! I just ordered another bottle. The older I get, the more trouble I have staying asleep. No problem going to sleep...just staying asleep. Also, I have had full ankle reconstruction surgery, as well as knee replacement surgery just this past February. So I am getting 2 for 1 with this product...pain relief and a great nights sleep! I am always willing to try anything if it will help alleviate pain. Well, I have found it! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil for a few weeks. The taste is much better than the previous brand i tried, and i definitely feel like it helps my sleep some (I'm a tough case, "normal" for me is less than six hours per night) as compared to when i do not take it. I also think it's helped my anxiety as well. I personally take 2 droppers at night at this point. Will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like dirt
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Charlottes Web and Eco life and thought I would give this brand a try. I question how pure it is, I don't feel the overall sense of wellness I have with other products used. (and I have the 1000 Mg bottle) It TASTES terrible. I feel like I am ingesting dirt, perhaps a flavored brand would be better. If I could I would send back, but I did not try this out in time enough to send back, I will not be buying this brand again. It is not cheaper than the other brands I used
customer_reviews.author: momma

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I already am on pain meds and sleeping pills so I couldn't say about those things, However, I've had three full torso surgeries on my spine and trying to wean myself off has bean a nightmare. UNTIL, I started using this CBD oil. I've gone from 4- 10ml. daily, to two a day and I'm working on one a day. It's difficult because The agony is still there, but I know this drug is not healthy for my brain or body. I'm so happy with CBD oil that I might have written an earlier review without this much description.
customer_reviews.author: chari978

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several bottles of this oil in the past few months. My arthritis was mild, but seems to be under control now, neuropathy is just minimal, instead of intense, like before. Ordered a bottle for a neighbor, and it took his neuropathy away completely. He ordered a second bottle. I have researched this a lot, and although I have never even smoked pot or handled any type of drugs, I honestly believe that CBD (Hemp) oil works as suggested. And it has no THC in it, so you cannot get high. Just healthier. Thank you R & R
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Richardson

customer_reviews.title: It works, be constant, give it a couple days
customer_reviews.text: It works, but give yourself constant doses over 72 hours. I have rotator cuff anf myofascial muscle knots. After 3 days of 3x/day my shoulder started to unlock. This is day 4--I didn't need a flexerall by 5pm like I usually do and I didn't take any Ibuprofen or Tylenol. I am not 100% pain free, but pain is much more tolerable even w/o prescribed meds and there are even some times of day where it is gone. When we get THC-A approved in my state I will switch to that but this works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Ever since i have used R & R hemp oil, my sleep has improved drastically. Not only do I fall asleep faster, but the quality of my sleep is great. I went walking the other day and when I returned, my legs were pretty sore. I took the hemp oil as soon as I got home and the pain went away within the hour. My wife and I will continue to use this product on a daily basis. Thank you, R & R.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dobrzynski

customer_reviews.title: No false advertising here
customer_reviews.text: I have not had experiences with this plant in 15+ years, but with the recent law changes and easy availability I thought I would give it a try.....this time THC free. At first, the effects were almost too strong but after a few minutes everything settled down and I felt calm, relaxed and anxiety free. I have not had pain in years so I cannot testify for its advantages in managing pain (as I'm knocking on wood and typing this review at the same time), but, I can testify for it's advantages in handling and controlling (to an extent) anxiety. This product has worked for me and I will be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: The Name's James

customer_reviews.title: TROUBLE SLEEPING?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on the recommendation of a friend who said it helped her a lot with pain. I just finished my first bottle. It hasn't done much for my pain yet. II suffer with severe back and hip arthritis . But I do find that it helps calm you and helps you sleep better. I chose the automatic plan and will be starting my second bottle today. I am hoping it will help more in the pain department. The flavor I picked is fresh peppermint. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandypants

customer_reviews.title: Now a believer in CBD
customer_reviews.text: After using for a week, this has increased my and my girlfriends sleep quality greatly. The first 2 nights taking the hemp oil, neither of us remember waking up at all and feel as if we slept like rocks. Both of us woke up feeling refreshed. The flavor is a good mint flavor and not overpowering. I had recently pulled and back muscle when this hemp oil arrived. The oil helped manage the pain but it is not like taking painkillers. I am very pleased with the product and plan on buying again. Any company that has third party testing truly believed in there produce in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Anna

customer_reviews.title: PRIME DAY HEMP OIL SUCCESS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some new HEMP OIL after my old company became too expensive, I was looking for some prime day deals and I found this company at first i was skeptical because the item was nearly 50% OFF so I searched their website online and found out these guys are legit, I purchased! two days later it showed up and i was skeptical until i tried it works just the same if not better than the OTHER brand. HAPPY CUSTOMER!
customer_reviews.author: Noah A

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value.
customer_reviews.text: The R&R Hemp Oil has the quality and potency of Products that are 2x the price and the customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Ron/CT. Fly Fisherman, guitarist, motorcyclist

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye $127 CBD!
customer_reviews.text: Holy s.... moke, this really works! Arrived quickly, in perfect condition, and for 1/3 of the price of CBD oil. The taste is AWFUL, but it works so well, I can tolerate that part. Be gone, stress!! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Matt2337

customer_reviews.title: No Pain
customer_reviews.text: This product has had multiple benefits for me. Most important is pain relief. I've battle chronic migrating pain since being diagnosed with breast cancer 8 years ago and this has taken it away. It's also been extremely beneficial in lowing my anxiety which I've had trouble with all my life. I highly recommend this product. I take a dropper full in the morning and another in the evening and I am totally satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McPherson

customer_reviews.title: this product works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of cbd oil but they were not as effective as R&R, it helps with sleep, anxiety, and most importantly, takes the edge off bad arthritic pain. One brand was mean enough to use a childproof tincture bottle that ,with my crippled hands, I couldn't get into . I can say that this product has improved the quality of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Crs

customer_reviews.title: Tastes TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This product taste TERRIBLE!! I was so anxious to try this because of the good reviews on it working but I COULD NOT get past the taste. It taste and smells like weed to the MAX. If you don't want to think you are chewing on a big bud then don't buy. There is no peppermint flavor in this at all! Pitched it. Wish I would have saved it and returned it to get my money back though.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Extreme anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I started using R+R 1000mg last week and I’m seeing the results already. I been suffering from a horrible anxiety for almost two years and I refused to take medicine for it. I’m constantly researching for natural medicine and meditation. I came across your company and read the reviews and decided to give it a try. So far I’m feeling less anxious and no chest pain from lack of breathing and lack of sleep, because my brain was restless I can breathe easily now. I will definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a natural relief. Note: I’m taking one dose in the morning and one before bed. Thank you R+R for this amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yudis moreta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that works fast!
customer_reviews.text: This product is much better than others that I have tried. I felt anxious and within minutes felt much calmer and breathing slowed down. I took it before bed last night and slept all night without waking! I applied it topically on my hand for joint pain relief and within a hour the pain and soreness was much better. I will definitely be buying this brand again. The smell and taste is hempy and earthy which I love! Just a hint of peppermint. Buy this product, you will not be disappointed. Also, I love the fact that this company is veteran USMC owned.
customer_reviews.author: d180

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless
customer_reviews.text: Tried for a few weeks, increasing dosage over time and saw absolutely no results. Do not be fooled into thinking that hemp oil is the same as the hemp extract used to make cbd oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amybooksit

customer_reviews.title: Top notch extract.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 2nd bottle last week of this fine product. From the fact it is all organically grown, to the 1000mg strength, or the actual yummy taste of the CBD and mint essence, this product is a winner. There are so many positive responses one can have with a product such as this that I have integrated it with other supplements I take on a daily basis for optimal health
customer_reviews.author: CleverTrever

product_meta.title: Hemp Oil 1000mg :: Hemp Oil for Pain :: Stress Relief, Mood Support, Healthy Sleep Patterns, Skin Care (1000mg, 33mg per Serving x 30 Servings) : R+R Medicinals
feature_bullets: HEMP OIL FOR PAIN RELIEF - Our omega supplement of hemp oil gives you a natural way to relieve chronic pain, inflammation, and more using the benefits of the hemp plant. It also provides anxiety & stress relief, & promotes better sleep patterns.

PREMIUM HEMP OIL - One serving (1mL) delivers a 33mg serving! Our blend gives a complete entourage effect that includes natural terpenes, flavonoids, antioxidants, and phytonutrients. Packed with essential omega fatty acids and calming essential peppermint oil. 30-Day Supply!

CO2 EXTRACTION AND LAB TESTED - We’re different; our organically grown hemp comes from certified Colorado hemp farms and is extracted through a cold, CO2 based state-of-the-art process that leaves nutrients intact. Every batch is third-party certified for safety and consistency.

FULLY LEGAL - Legal in all 50 states, our industrial hemp is organically grown only from certified Colorado hemp farms. Consult your healthcare provider and employer before consuming any hemp product (including hemp seeds and hemp protein) as trace phytonutrients may lead to a positive test result.

LOCAL AND COLORADO PROUD - Everything we do, from the farm to product, is done locally within our community. We serve our community and others with pride, and would be honored to have you support our small business!
